text: Mbeki is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Thabo Mbeki, former President of South Africa * Govan Mbeki, the father of Thabo Mbeki * Epainette Mbeki, the mother of Thabo Mbeki, President of South Africa * Moeletsi Mbeki, son of Govan and brother of Thabo, deputy chairman of the South African Institute of International Affairs Category:Xhosa-language surnames
title: Mbeki
